Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation:
w "" &html<
> s firstClass=1 s class="" for { s class=$o(^test(class)) Q:class="" w:'firstClass "," s:firstClass firstClass=0 w !,"""",class,""": { colModel: [" s list=$LFS(^test(class),"#@#") s k=0,a="",firstProp=1 while $LISTNEXT(list,k,a){ continue:a="" w:'firstProp "," s:firstProp firstProp=0 s plist=$LFS(a,"~") s prop=$LG(plist),lbl=$LG(plist,2) w !,$c(9),"{name: """,prop,""", label: """,lbl,"""}" } w "]}" } &html<
> Quit $$$OK
